thread.section_title: Roger Smith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Better than Expected!
thread.title_full: Better than Expected! - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kelly M
title: Better than Expected!
text:
I like older properties, I like steam radiators clanking in the night as they heat up, and I like windows that actually open up for fresh air! I like the beams in the ceiling, the cracks and the original plaster moldings . . . . comfy bed, great view, and a bath tub! Liked the live plant in the room and the couch.
Free wi-fi is very nice, and they have books to read and free DVD's if you want to watch movies.
The only thing, they don't have a restaurant on the property, and they do have space for it! Shame, I could see an additional location for Le Pain Quotidien fitting in perfectly with this property!!
